pointer.description: If set, cursor is changed to pointer
pointer.description_zh: 如果设置，则 cursor 将更改为 pointer

type.description: Controls input styles when focused. If auto the input is hidden when not focused. If visible the input will always remain visible. 'visible' by default
type.description_zh: 在聚焦时控制输入样式。如果为 auto，则在未聚焦时隐藏输入。如果可见，则输入将始终保持可见。默认为 'visible'
